arts.ttl: Burnley vs Liverpool Preview: Premier League, Gameweek Four, 2025/26
arts.sum: Liverpool will look to maintain their 100% start to their 25/26 Premier League campaign when they travel to face Burnley in a match where the Reds will be firm favourites to take all three points in this encounter. They will be looking to make it twelve points out of twelve when they face a Burnley team who have had a mixed start to life back in the Premier League .

arts.ttl: Liverpool XI vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Reigning champions Liverpool travel to Turf Moor on Sunday, aiming to continue their perfect start to the season and make it four wins from four. Arne Slot’s side are in formidable form and are currently on a club-record scoring run in the top flight.
